r.s: Provides access to the DynDNS web service
r.d: Services_DynDNS provides object-oriented interfaces to the DynDNS REST API.
r.n: * Fixed package.xml @package_version@ and removed depencency on version 1.2.4 of HTTP_Request * In Services_DynDNS_Response, changed from double-quotes to single where appropriate * Changed constant name SERVICES_DYNDNS_DEFAULT_HTTP_VER to SERVICES_DYNDNS_DEFAULT_HTTP_VERSION * Changed constant name SERVICES_DYNDNS_DEFAULT_REQ_TYPE to SERVICES_DYNDNS_DEFAULT_REQUEST_TYPE * Minor docblock changes * Will provide end-user documentation once the package API is frozen (beta)
